Plot: A film director, Walter, meets his old team to make a "road movie". With no money, they will have come up with scams in order to make the production possible while at the same time plotting revenge.
Title: Payback
Writer: L.G. Bayão (collaborating writer), André Moraes, André Moraes
Actors: Deborah Secco, Lúcio Mauro Filho, Júlio Andrade, Bruno Torres
